features.featureTitle: Update the application name displayed in the header navigation to 'TestAut'. The change should apply to the link element and span element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/a[1] and /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/a[1]/span[1], which correspond to the logo/brand name in the Layout component.
